attributes.action: Prosecute financial institutes that mislead the public with regards to charity donations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to a recent article in the Guardian newspaper, Britain's high street banks have raised billions of pounds in funds through complex financial deals, that use supposedly charitable trusts which are not donating a penny to good causes and in many cases without the charity organisations even being made aware. Guilty of resorting to the tactics of confidence tricksters, it is only fitting that the culprits be dealt with accordingly.
